location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 344: Lieutenant-Colonel Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Samuel Hennell forwards a copy of his letter, dated 3 September 1850, to Her Majesty's Minister at the Court of Persia, Lieutenant-Colonel Justin Sheil, which concerned the removal of Sheik Nasir from the Government of Bushire. The enclosure is not included, but it appears as the previous item in the file (ff.127-130).
